Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: SB 34 South Michigan buses are temp. rrtd: Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 130th, and Indiana due to, street blockage near 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 130th, and Indiana.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Harlem (O'Hare). Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Harlem (O'Hare).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
